item.title: Education
item.description:
• PhD in Management Engineering
    University of Rome “Tor Vergata”
    2002 – 2004
    ISCED 6. Obtained on 14/12/2004, XVIII cycle.

  • Level II Master’s degree in Business Organization and Management
    University of Rome “Tor Vergata”
    2001 – 2002
    Obtained on 13/12/2002, grade A.

  • Master’s Degree (Vecchio Ordinamento) in Management Engineering (MD 509/99)
    University of Rome “Tor Vergata”
    1993 – 2000
    Obtained on 07/12/2000, grade 98/100.
